author: psmith
msg: moved out a lot of code in the constructor to individual methods
Also added a Toolbar and popup menu to the Message Center's

author: psmith
msg: refactored some constants into the constants class.

author: psmith
msg: Decoupled components from having to know about the Status bar,
LogUI now installs an appender to forward new messages onto the status bar.

author: psmith
msg: Made this class public for use within other package.

author: psmith
msg: Introduced a Message Center concept to decouple the element
within Chainsaw that need to display messages to the user.
